verses.verse: The word <WH1697> of Yahweh <WH3068> came to me, <WH559> saying,

Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> set <WH7760> your face <WH6440> toward Jerusalem, <WH3389> and drop <WH5197> your word toward the sanctuaries, <WH4720> and prophesy <WH5012> against the land <WH127> of Israel; <WH3478>

and tell <WH559> the land <WH127> of Israel, <WH3478> Thus says <WH559> Yahweh: <WH3068> Behold, <WH3318> I am against you, and will draw forth my sword <WH2719> out of its sheath, <WH8593> and will cut off <WH3772> from you the righteous <WH6662> and the wicked. <WH7563>

Seeing <WH3282> then that I will cut off <WH3772> from you the righteous <WH6662> and the wicked, <WH7563> therefore shall my sword <WH2719> go forth <WH3318> out of its sheath <WH8593> against all flesh <WH1320> from the south <WH5045> to the north: <WH6828>
and all flesh <WH1320> shall know <WH3045> that I, <WH3068> Yahweh, have drawn forth <WH3318> my sword <WH2719> out of its sheath; <WH8593> it shall not return any more. <WH7725>
Sigh <WH584> therefore, <WH1121> you son of man; <WH120> with the breaking <WH7670> of your thighs <WH4975> and with bitterness <WH4814> you will sigh <WH584> before their eyes. <WH5869>

It shall be, <WH559> when they tell you, <WH584> Why do you sigh? that you shall say, <WH559> Because of the news, <WH8052> for it comes; <WH935> and every heart <WH3820> shall melt, <WH4549> and all hands <WH3027> shall be feeble, <WH7503> and every spirit <WH7307> shall faint, <WH3543> and all knees <WH1290> shall be weak <WH3212> as water: <WH4325> behold, <WH935> it comes, and it shall be done, <WH1961> says <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh. <WH3069>
The word <WH1697> of Yahweh <WH3068> came to me, <WH559> saying,

Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> prophesy, <WH5012> and say, <WH559> Thus says <WH559> Yahweh: <WH3068> Say, <WH559> A sword, <WH2719> a sword, <WH2719> it is sharpened, <WH2300> and also furbished; <WH4803>

it is sharpened <WH2300> that it may make a <WH2874> slaughter; <WH2873> it is furbished <WH4178> that it may be as lightning: <WH1300> shall <WH176> we then make mirth? <WH7797> the rod <WH7626> of my son, <WH1121> it condemns <WH3988> every tree. <WH6086>

It is given <WH5414> to be furbished, <WH4803> that it may be handled: <WH3709> the sword, <WH2719> it is sharpened, <WH2300> yes, <WH4178> it is furbished, to give <WH5414> it into the hand <WH3027> of the killer. <WH2026>

Cry <WH2199> and wail, <WH3213> son <WH1121> of man; <WH120> for it is on my people, <WH5971> it is on all the princes <WH5387> of Israel: <WH3478> they are delivered <WH4048> over to <WH413> the sword <WH2719> with my people; <WH5971> strike <WH5606> therefore on your thigh. <WH3409>
For there is a trial; <WH974> and what if even the rod <WH7626> that condemns <WH3988> shall be no more? <WH5002> says the Lord <WH136> Yahweh. <WH3069>

You therefore, <WH1121> son of man, <WH120> prophesy, <WH5012> and strike <WH5221> your hands <WH3709> together; <WH5221> and let the sword <WH2719> be doubled <WH3717> the third <WH7992> time, <WH2719> the sword of the deadly wounded: <WH2491> it is the sword <WH2719> of the great <WH1419> one who is deadly wounded, <WH2491> which enters into their rooms. <WH2314>

I have set <WH5414> the threatening <WH19> sword <WH2719> against all their gates, <WH8179> that their heart <WH3820> may melt, <WH4127> and their stumblings <WH4383> be multiplied: <WH7235> ah! <WH253> it is made <WH6213> as lightning, <WH1300> it is pointed <WH4593> for slaughter. <WH2874>
Gather yourselves together, <WH258> go to <WH7760> the right, <WH3231> set yourselves in array, <WH8041> go to the left, wherever <WH575> your face <WH6440> is set. <WH3259>
I will also strike <WH5221> my hands <WH3709> together, <WH3709> and I will cause my wrath <WH2534> to rest: <WH5117> I, <WH3068> Yahweh, have spoken it. <WH1696>
The word <WH1697> of Yahweh <WH3068> came to me again, <WH559> saying,

Also, <WH1121> you son of man, <WH120> appoint <WH7760> two <WH8147> ways, <WH1870> that the sword <WH2719> of the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894> may come; <WH935> they both <WH8147> shall come forth <WH3318> out of one <WH259> land: <WH776> and mark out <WH1254> a place, <WH3027> mark it out <WH1254> at the head <WH7218> of the way <WH1870> to the city. <WH5892>

You shall appoint <WH7760> a way <WH1870> for the sword <WH2719> to come <WH935> to Rabbah <WH7237> of the children of Ammon, <WH1121> and to Judah <WH3063> in Jerusalem <WH3389> the fortified. <WH1219>

For the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894> stood <WH5975> at the parting <WH517> of the way, <WH1870> at the head <WH7218> of the two <WH8147> ways, <WH1870> to use <WH7080> divination: <WH7081> he shook <WH7043> the arrows <WH2671> back and forth, <WH7592> he consulted the teraphim, <WH8655> he looked <WH7200> in the liver. <WH3516>

In his right hand <WH3225> was the divination <WH7081> for Jerusalem, <WH3389> to set <WH7760> battering rams, <WH3733> to open <WH6605> the mouth <WH6310> in the slaughter, <WH7524> to lift up <WH7311> the voice <WH6963> with shouting, <WH8643> to set <WH7760> battering rams <WH3733> against the gates, <WH8179> to cast <WH8210> up mounds, <WH5550> to build <WH1129> forts. <WH1785>

It shall be to them as a false <WH7723> divination <WH7080> in their sight, <WH5869> who have sworn <WH7650> oaths <WH7621> to them; <WH5771> but he brings iniquity to memory, <WH2142> that they may be taken. <WH8610>

Therefore thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh: <WH136> Because you have made your iniquity <WH5771> to be remembered, <WH2142> in that your transgressions <WH6588> are uncovered, <WH1540> so that in all your doings <WH5949> your sins <WH2403> appear; <WH7200> because you have come to memory, <WH2142> you shall be taken <WH8610> with the hand. <WH3709>
You, <WH2491> deadly wounded wicked <WH7563> one, <WH5387> the prince of Israel, <WH3478> whose day <WH3117> has come, <WH935> in the time <WH3117> of the iniquity <WH5771> of the end, <WH7093>

thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh: <WH3069> Remove <WH5493> the turban, <WH4701> and take off <WH7311> the crown; <WH5850> this shall be no more the same; <WH2063> exalt <WH1361> that which is low, <WH8217> and abase <WH8213> that which is high. <WH1364>
I will overturn, <WH5754> overturn, <WH5754> overturn <WH5754> it: <WH7760> this also shall be no more, <WH935> until he come whose right <WH4941> it is; <WH5414> and I will give it him.

You, <WH1121> son of man, <WH120> prophesy, <WH5012> and say, <WH559> Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh <WH3069> concerning the children of Ammon, <WH1121> and concerning their reproach; <WH2781> and say, <WH559> A sword, <WH2719> a sword <WH2719> is drawn, <WH6605> for the slaughter <WH2874> it is furbished, <WH4803> to cause it to devour, <WH398> that it may be as lightning; <WH1300>

while they see <WH2372> for you false visions, <WH7080> while they divine lies <WH3577> to you, <WH6677> to lay you on the necks of the wicked <WH7563> who are deadly wounded, <WH3117> whose day has come <WH935> in the time <WH3117> of the iniquity <WH5771> of the end. <WH7093>
Cause it to return <WH7725> into its sheath. <WH8593> In the place <WH4725> where you were created, <WH1254> in the land <WH776> of your birth, <WH4351> will I judge you. <WH8199>

I will pour out <WH8210> my indignation <WH2195> on you; <WH6315> I will blow on you with the fire <WH784> of my wrath; <WH5678> and I will deliver <WH5414> you into the hand <WH3027> of brutish <WH1197> men, <WH582> skillful <WH2796> to destroy. <WH4889>

You shall be for fuel <WH402> to the fire; <WH784> your blood <WH1818> shall be in the midst <WH8432> of the land; <WH776> you shall be remembered <WH2142> no more: <WH3068> for I, Yahweh, have spoken it. <WH1696>
